item.description: The following message will be sent to 111 customers. This message is from Mon Power. On Thursday, August 29, 2024, there will be a planned power outage to upgrade facilities. The outage will affect customers in the vicinity of West Union, WV. If you are receiving this message, you will experience a service interruption from approximately 7:30 am to 2:30 pm. In the event of inclement weather the planned outage will be rescheduled for Friday, August 30, 2024. If you have any questions please call: 800-686-0022. Mon Power thanks you for your patience and understanding while we perform this work to improve your electric service reliability. This outage will not affect any accounts in the city limits of West Union. The outage is mostly along the following roads: Lois Ln, Duckworth Rd, Stone Valley Rd, Central Station Rd, Sam Calvins Rd, Pichette Dr and Arnolds Creek Rd.

item.description: This message is from Mon Power. On Tuesday, August 27, 2024, there will be a planned power outage to upgrade facilities. The outage will affect customers in the vicinity of New Milton and West Union, WV. If you are receiving this message, you will experience a service interruption from approximately 7:30 am to 2:30 pm. In the event of inclement weather the planned outage will be rescheduled for Wednesday, August 28, 2024. If you have any questions please call: 800-686-0022. Mon Power thanks you for your patience and understanding while we perform this work to improve your electric service reliability. This outage starts along Route 18 near Willis Store Rd and continues south along Route 18 to just past Toms Fork. It also includes customers in the Porto Rico area.
